name: Arborium (Hyperspace Wizard)
description:
Made for Trijam #83, a 3 hour game jam.

Controls

wasd - Move camera.

q/e - Rotate planetoid.

mouse scroll wheel - Zoom in and out.

Click the branch/leaf buttons to toggle between building branches and leaves.

How to Play

There are 4 stems slightly sticking out of the planet. If you mouse over them a green circle will appear. Click to start building a branch, move your mouse, then click to finish building. Leaves can only be placed on the ends of branches. The goal is to relax and build some cool looking trees

Hitting the restart button explodes the trees.

Original Concept

I initially wanted to make some space odyssey about an alien race of space-fairing trees called Indarts. You would have played as a baby Indart who was separated from its tribe, having to manage resources and strategically grow your way through the star systems to return home. Given the 3 hour time constraint I settled for a chill tree building sim.

Music

Music: Better Days by Lakey Inspired

Music Provided By: No Copyright Music
